message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. That price is a bit too high for me, would you consider $8,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your offer, the $20,000 price reflects the true value of this product. Could you meet me halfway at $14,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me. $14,000 is still a bit above my budget. Could we settle at $10,000?
